column1: nannie mae phipps kitchens| nannie man phipps kitchens
column5: at willson's hospice house. funeral arrangements to be announced. i am home in heaven
column7: so happy and so bright! there is perfect joy and beautyin this everlasting light. all the pain and grief are over! every restless yearning past; i am now at peace forever
column8: safely home in heaven at last. dear one
column10: for i love you dearly still; try to look beyond earths shadows
column11: pray to trust our fathers will. when your work is completed
column12: he will gently call you home; oh! the rapture of that meeting! oh
column13: the joy to see you come.
